entry.title: Canna Lily
entry.summary:
Vendor: SpringerGarden
Type: Houseplants
Price: 11.99

Musa is one of two or three genera in the family Musaceae. The genus includes flowering plants producing edible bananas and plantains. Around 70 species of Musa are known, with a broad variety of uses.

8'' Pot

Vendor: SpringerGarden
Type: Houseplants

entry.title: Codiaeum Variegatum Variant
entry.summary:
Vendor: SpringerGarden
Type: Houseplants
Price: 8.99 - 29.99 (2 variants)

Codiaeum variegatum is a species of plant in the genus Codiaeum, which is a member of the family Euphorbiaceae. It is native to Indonesia, Malaysia, Australia, and the western Pacific Ocean islands, growing in open forests and scrub.
